Package model.cards

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.cards.Deck
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class representing a deck of cards, decks contain all same kind of cards
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck()
        Create a new empty deck without discard

      • Deck

        public Deck​(boolean garbage)
        Create a new empty deck. If garbage is true, it also creates an empty discarded card deck
        Parameters:
        garbage - if true set the discarded card deck

    • Method Detail

      • flush

        public void flush()
        Empty the decks

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        Move the discarded cards into the deck and shuffle it

      • addCard

        public void addCard​(Card card)
        Add a card to the deck
        Parameters:
        card - the card to add

      • draw

        public Card draw()
        Draw the top card from the deck, return it and remove it from the deck
        Returns:
        null if the deck is empty or if all the cards have been discarded, otherwise returns the top card

      • discardCard

        public void discardCard​(Card card)
        if garbage is false it inserts at the bottom of the deck the card, otherwise it inserts it on the top of discard
        Parameters:
        card - the card to be discarded

      • numOfCards

        public int numOfCards()
        Return the number of cards left in the deck
        Returns:
        number of cards in the deck

      • numOfDiscards

        public int numOfDiscards()

        number of cards in the discard deck
